message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am only able to pay up to $95 for the product.
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I am able to offer $100 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $110, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to stick to my original offer of $100 for the product. Thank you for considering it.
